item.title: Setting Up a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W with Ubuntu Server
item.description: Introduction This is a guide for installing Ubuntu Server on a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W via a headless setup using the Raspberry Pi Imager and another computer running Linux. Many of the steps are outlined in the Raspberry Pi Foundation’s Documentation in the Getting Started Guide. There are a few additional steps and helpful details that this guide is intended to provide for a smooth setup. Parts for the Pi There are several necessary components:
